body:
Ever since I started developing my resource pack and recording, people kept asking me for it.
Well...
HERE IT IS.
NOW YOU CAN STOP ASKING! :D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8IodNEFRJ0E

Enjoy x)

Either way, it's considered copyright infrigment, and is not allowed without proper permission, because he's releasing it to the public.

http://bdcraft.net/license-terms-of-use

replies.body: Even if you say that, it's still considered copyright. The bow isn't copyright because it's an edit off the faithful textures, and faithful allows you to release an edit of his pack as long as a youtube video is made.
replies.body_tagged: Even if you say that, it's still considered copyright. The bow isn't copyright because it's an edit off the faithful textures, and faithful allows you to release an edit of his pack as long as a youtube video is made.
